title: Experienced Player Looking To Do Analysis Work!
body:
I'm interested in doing some analysis work as a hobby in my free time, and was wondering if anyone would want me to do VoD reviews for them. Whether you're an organised team looking for a fresh perspective on your games, or just a SoloQ player wanting to improve your game, I'd love to help out. I've been a Gold/Platinum player for multiple seasons and have a good understanding of the game, enough to know where improvement can be made.

I've worked with other players and local teams in the past (nothing too serious) and have helped them improve themselves through both VoD review and individual player analysis. In turn, this has helped me become better at breaking fundamentals down and being able to give helpful advice. I'm still learning the in's and out's on doing analysis and giving useful feedback, but am slowly improving.

If you're interested in having me look at your games, reply here or add me on the client (OCE): REF5ESH

replies.body: I'm a solo q b5. I have a terrible rank due to me only being good at top lane. I am really good at top lane though. I feel like now that i can get either top or jg every game, I can climb quickly. My rank doesnt reflect my skills however I have soooo much to learn yet, I would love for you to help

Ranked team : Silver 1 Last year, with Plat/Diamonds in there!
Add: Plentaaay, Grimzz or Abzu :)
Wouldn't mind some advice! Will you be watching my games or do I need to send you replay files of them?
For now I'd just get you to send me replays, and I'd give you feedback on as much as I can. Add me in-client and message me so I know, and we'll go from there!
